Description: Hear from Dr. Pascal Bamford, SVP of R&D and Laboratory Operations, about Akoya’s new Spatial Biology 2.0 solutions which build on the company’s proven, highly cited platforms – the PhenoCycler-Fusion system and PhenoImager HT system – and enable spatial insights and precision medicine at unprecedented scale. Dr. Bamford will be joined by 2023 Cure Cancer Researcher of the Year Dr. Arutha Kulasinghe who will share how he is leveraging these technologies to see the tumor microenvironment like never before, elucidate the mechanisms of cancer treatment response, and pave the way for spatial biology to impact the lives of patients and their families.
Location: Spotlight Theater A - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP5A. Spatial Biology 2.0: Spatial Insights & Precision Medicine at Unprecedented Scale

Title: Spatial Biology 2.0: Spatial Insights & Precision Medicine at Unprecedented Scale
